3. On occasions, depending on supply chain constraints, the procurement of medicines, and surgical consumables
(such as syringes) can be a challenge.
4. Staff at the ward level, as well as those in supply chain and finance are aware of their responsibilities, and work
at all times to ensure that the equipment needed for care is available, but the lack thereof is sometimes beyond
their control, especially, but not exclusively at the end and beginning of new fin
